Package animalchess.model

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
animalchess.model.Tile
animalchess.model.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cat, Dog, Elephant, Leopard, Lion, Mouse, Tiger, Wolf
public abstract class Piece extends Tile
An abstract class for declaring the animal pieces depending on the given animal type.

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece​(PlayerType player, PieceType type, GamePoint pos, int rank)
      The animal piece to be created.
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the piece
      type - the animal type
      pos - the starting position on the board

  • Method Details

    • capture

      public abstract boolean capture​(Piece animal)
      This checks the rank of the two animals that meet in one position. It also captures the animal if it has lower rank and It outputs whether the animal has been captured or cannot be captured.
      Parameters:
      animal - the opponent's piece
      Returns:
      returns true if the animal can be captured, otherwise returns false

    • capture

      public boolean capture​(AnimalDen animalDen)
      This checks the owner of the animal den. This prevents the player to go to his own den.
      Parameters:
      animalDen - the animal den owned by a player.
      Returns:
      canCapture true or false if the animal can go to the den.

    • capture

      public boolean capture​(Trap trap)
      This checks the owner of the trap and the trapped piece. This prevents the player to go to his own trap.
      Parameters:
      trap - the trap owned by a player.
      Returns:
      canCapture true or false if the animal can go to the trap or capture a trapped piece.

    • capture

      public boolean capture​(River river)
      This checks the mouse on the river and the trapped piece. This prevents the player to go to the river unless its a Mouse.
      Parameters:
      river - the river (destination).
      Returns:
      canCapture true or false if the animal can go to the river.

    • setCaptured

      public void setCaptured​(boolean isCaptured)
      Sets true or false to bCaptured if an animal is captured.
      Parameters:
      isCaptured - a boolean parameter if animal is captured.

    • setTrapped

      public void setTrapped​(boolean isTrapped)
      Sets true or false to bTrapped if an animal is trapped.
      Parameters:
      isTrapped - a boolean parameter if animal is trapped.

    • setPos

      public void setPos​(GamePoint pos)
      This sets the location of an animal to currentPos
      Parameters:
      pos - contains the position of an animal

    • isCaptured

      public boolean isCaptured()
      This returns if the animal is captured or not.

    • isTrapped

      public boolean isTrapped()
      This returns if the animal is trapped or not.

    • getPieceName

      public String getPieceName()
      This returns the full name of the animal.

    • getPos

      public GamePoint getPos()
      This returns the current position of the animal.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      This converts the GameImage (path) assigned to each animal to string
      Overrides:
      toString in class Tile
      Returns:
      returns the respective image path of the animal
      See Also:
      GameImages
